Detailed Description

This class extends the XConsole with editing capabilities.

virtual void EditConsole::processLine ( const std::wstring &  line  )  [protected, pure virtual]

This method should be overridden by derived classes.

It is called whenever there is a line for this console to process.

Parameters:
line A string containing the current line to be processed.

Implemented in DebugConsole, and PythonConsole.
